name: Avoid Artifacts with too many parameters (Swift)
description: Avoid artifacts with more than X parameters. The threshold X is a parameter and it can be changed at will.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, artifacts should not have too many parameters.
total: Number of Swift functions and methods
alternativeName: Avoid Artifacts with too many parameters (Swift)

technicalCriteria.name: ASCMM-MNT-13 - Callable and Method Control Element Excessive Number of Parameters
CWE-1064: Invokable Control Element with Signature Containing an Excessive Number of Parameters
Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity

qualityStandards.name: Callable and Method Control Element Excessive Number of Parameters
qualityStandards.description:
Objective
Avoid over-parameterization

Consequence
Software that does not cap the number of parameters degrades comprehensibility

Measure Element
Number of instances where a named callable control element or method control element has a number of parameters in its signature that exceeds a threshold value. Default threshold value for the number of parameters is 7.

qualityStandards.name: Invokable Control Element with Signature Containing an Excessive Number of Parameters
qualityStandards.description: The software contains a function, subroutine, or method whose signature has an unnecessarily large number of parameters/arguments.
